name: game about fighting malware
description:
It's all about fighting malwares: viruses, worms, trojans.
This game still has no title soooo yeah...
and it's still a prototype/demo version for our college thesis. Feel free to try it!

Oh yeah,  if you ever get error messages please put it in the comments section or send me an email at qcore09@gmail.com. That'll be helpful. Thanks!
